title: IV (Intravenous) Vitamin C Therapy Vancouver
cleaned_text: IV Vitamin C We have been offering IV Vitamin C therapy since 2003. Patients tolerate this IV very well. We customize the dose of vitamin C for every patient. We prescribe up to 50 grams. The IV takes about 45-60 min and is usually given once or twice a week. The cost of this IV is $110. Health Canada prohibits the advertisement of IV Vitamins for clinical use for diseases and health conditions. Thus, we only mention that this particular IV is offered at our office. Please email or call the office for more information regarding this treatment.
